attributes.action: Make a school holiday for Eid Mubarak.
attributes.additional_details: There is a holiday for Christmas so the U.K isn`t being fair to all religions and many people have campaigned for it to be a holiday and no change has been made.
attributes.background: I believe that there should be a holiday to celebrate Eid Mubarak.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/612985
